issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

fields.description: Between HDFS-8350 and probably other changes, it would appear site -Pdocs -Pdist no longer works and is breaking the nightly build.
fields.summary: fix site -Pdocs -Pdist in hadoop-project-dist; cleanout remaining forrest bits

comments.body:
-00:
* Remove all of the deprecated forrest stuff
* Remove release notes and changes bits since those were replaced by releasedocmaker
* Remove remaining references to src/main/docs

\\
\\
| (x) *{color:red}-1 overall{color}* |
\\
\\
|| Vote || Subsystem || Runtime || Comment ||
| {color:red}-1{color} | patch |   0m  0s | The patch command could not apply the patch during dryrun. |
\\
\\
|| Subsystem || Report/Notes ||
| Patch URL | http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12735020/HADOOP-12011.00.patch |
| Optional Tests | javadoc javac unit site |
| git revision | trunk / 446d515 |
| Console output | https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/6804/console |


This message was automatically generated.

-01:
* different format

fwiw, running:
{code}
 mvn clean verify -Drequire.test.libhadoop -Pdist -Pnative -Dtar -Pdocs -fae -DskipTests
{code}

in hadoop-hdfs-project simulates the problem.

\\
\\
| (x) *{color:red}-1 overall{color}* |
\\

|| Vote || Subsystem || Runtime || Comment ||

This message was automatically generated.

This message was automatically generated.

I ran {{ mvn clean site -Preleasedocs; mvn site:stage -DstagingDirectory=/tmp/hadoop-site }} and checked that the documentation produced didn't reference any of the files that were deleted.
Patch looks good to me. +1.
Thanks for the review. Committed!
